fr.inria.atlanmod.mogwai.neoemf.resource

Class MogwaiResourceFactory

  • Object
    • PersistentResourceFactory
      • MogwaiResourceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource.Factory

    public class MogwaiResourceFactory
extends PersistentResourceFactory
    The factory that creates MogwaiResource instances.
    Author:
    Gwendal DANIEL

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface Resource.Factory

        Resource.Factory.Descriptor, Resource.Factory.Registry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Resource createResource(URI uri)
      This method delegates to PersistentResourceFactory if the provided uri doesn't use either MogwaiURI.MOGWAI_SCHEME or BlueprintsURI.SCHEME as its scheme.
      MogwaiResource decoratePersistentResource(PersistentResource persistentResource)
      Creates a new MogwaiResource wrapping the provided persistentResource.
      static MogwaiResourceFactory getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MogwaiResourceFactory

        protected MogwaiResourceFactory()
        Constructs a new MogwaiResourceFactory.

        This method is not public because only one factory should be in memory at any time. Use getInstance() instead.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MogwaiResourceFactory getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of this class.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of this class

      • createResource

        public Resource createResource(URI uri)

        This method delegates to PersistentResourceFactory if the provided uri doesn't use either MogwaiURI.MOGWAI_SCHEME or BlueprintsURI.SCHEME as its scheme.

        Specified by:
        createResource in interface Resource.Factory
        Overrides:
        createResource in class PersistentResourceFactory

      • decoratePersistentResource

        public MogwaiResource decoratePersistentResource(PersistentResource persistentResource)
                                          throws MogwaiCoreException
        Creates a new MogwaiResource wrapping the provided persistentResource.

        Use this method when persistentResource is already opened and loaded to avoid embedded database multiple connection errors and benefit from the setup caches from the underlying database.

        Parameters:
        persistentResource - the PersistentResource to wrap
        Returns:
        a MogwaiResource wrapping the provided persistentResource
        Throws:
        MogwaiCoreException - if the provided persistentResource is not compatible with Mogwai
